snippet.title: Yakuza: Like a Dragon | Heroes of Tomorrow
snippet.description:
You've never seen a party like this.​

Yakuza: Like a Dragon brings you the heroes of tomorrow.​

Pre-order now on Xbox Series X, Xbox One, Windows 10, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and Steam.​

likeadragon.sega.com
